website_summaries.verdict: This model is spacious without sacrificing style, making it perfect for students and student athletes.
pros: With its 30-liter capacity, the design is a cool take on the classic logo
Padded pocket can fit a 15" laptop
There are several other internal pockets for things like a cell phone
cons: May hang too low for people with short torsos

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my high school daughter (back to school).. its made really well and the best size for her school stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Son's highschool bag
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's lightweight. Easy enough to travel in between classes and stuff in his locker. He so far enjoys it and has lasted because I bought this back in September, along with his back to school gear. So far no holes or falling apart which is very good. Thanks Amazon for making the shipping super fast on this item!!
customer_reviews.author: FiveInACup

customer_reviews.title: Another great bag by Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but it's still a great bag. I bought this to use while cycling to work. The straps kind of rub on the shoulders while riding if my as are exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Artimus Jenkinz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and poor materials used
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has only used the backpack for a couple weeks and the backpack seems have come apart and is frayed. She can no longer use it because the zipper will not zip over the frayed strings 😓 not what my Adidas supporting family would expect. Not even sure if we can return it though Amazon?!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for high schoolers.
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight but durable. I would have given it 5 stars except it’s a bit on the small side to fit everything in there for my high schooler. He can fit two large binders (the soft cover type) and his thin chrome book case and struggles to get it zipped. If he had to transport textbooks every day there’s no way they would fit. Also, compared to other backpacks we’ve had, this one has very few compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Backpack...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted/needed it for school. Her beginning of school bag was getting worn out and torn, so it needed to be replaced. So far, she loves it. Great daily backpack. Stylish and cute... hopefully it makes her till the end of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Great material and looks, but came frayed
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and feels great as well. Only real problem was that some of the fabric near the pocket copper came frayed. Nothing awful but still worth noting. Otherwise it’s totally a great backpack
customer_reviews.author: Raichu

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She loves it. Only complaint is that it only has one bottle holder, but if I would've read the descriptionore carefully it probably says that.
customer_reviews.author: Houseofjulii

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice backpack and my daughter loves it - however for the price, i feel it could be higher quality. The item came in a plastic bag - I assume it was made in china. The zippers get stuck already (we’ve had it less than a week) and one of the seems appears to be shredding. The main pocket is deep and has a lot of room, but the other 2 are very small and not much can fit. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paightons Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good back pack. Got it for my daughter for school. She likes it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sucks
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke right away. Adidas is probably made in Thailand in some where like that. Most these companies produce stuff overseas and create junk.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and has lots of storage space for books, folders, and supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelyone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag for my teen age daughter fit all her stuff in it and her chromebook for school. Love!
customer_reviews.author: De Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it had more pockets but it’s the perfect size for college and very nice! I was worried my hydroflask wouldn’t fit in the pocket because it isn’t stretchy but it barely does.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son a few weeks ago for his school backpack and the right shoulder strap has already ripped from the back pack. I paid ~$40 on this back pack and expected it to last all year not less than 3 weeks. He has only been to school 2-3x a week those 3 weeks also so he hasn’t even been using it a full 5 days each week.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sikes

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t actually used the bag yet but I can fit all four of my binders, (2 1 inch and 2 1 1/2 inch) a three subject notebook, and 3 plastic folders in it. Even then, I still have a little room to spare so it’s obvious that it is very spacious and perfect for a middle/high schooler
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for the bag. Makes an excellent versatile bag for overnight or school.
customer_reviews.author: Corin

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Holds all of his school supplies nicely. The pockets for the water bottles could be a bit wider!
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using it for a couple of months now, but are pleased with the size and quality of this backpack. It is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds allot
customer_reviews.text: Thought the backpack was black. But ended up with a navy one. Maybe I didn’t read the description right. Either way I love the navy color and it has lots of room inside!
customer_reviews.author: Acacia Berg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack my Son loves it quality good and its light weight
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as expected, I used it as my only carry on for a trip I took to Boston. Love the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, large size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, my 10 yo daughter loves it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Kulpa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and great backpack for my high school kid... perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice backpack however not enough compartments and needs extra effort to keep clean due to the light colour.
customer_reviews.author: Vanny

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from the 12 year old son, seems to be fitting the bill
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bookbag
customer_reviews.text: Not best material. A lot smaller than expected. If needed this for books for school it probably won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Perfect for teens
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the color and bought the lunch pail too
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This backpack works well for my teenage daughter. Not sure how long it will last with all the books she has to carry.
customer_reviews.author: TJones

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for high school. Seems to be durable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack all around!
customer_reviews.text: Pack pack gas several compartments to help organize. It’s light weight and very soft’
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really good material. My daughter is going to use it in highschool. Great size for school supplies. Cheaper than in our local stores!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband and he really likes it and it's a very nice looking bag
customer_reviews.author: Admazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves this bag. Holds 7th grade books, supplies and lunch bag nicely. He is able to keep small items organized with small pockets and water bottle fits nicely on the side. Looks cute on as well!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is very very low quality and after one day of use they seams were already starting to come apart. I have had this backpack for around a month now, and there are already large holes in the seams. I do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect school bag for my 10 year old son. It holds his books, binders and lunch box comfortably and the should padding is comfortable for him. When dirt or mud has been found it sponges off easily.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, spray with fabric sealer
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made, hard to clean. Should have scotchguarded. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FDR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Grandson asked for a Adidas backpack to start school. He loves it. Everything fits in the backpack. So far it has held up and it isn't too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas Lots of room but low profile Good looking bag for PhD student
customer_reviews.author: expatinvienna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nicebackpack. A bit smaller than I expected but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L

customer_reviews.title: Liked it very much...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my 10-year-old. Great quality. Very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack for school
customer_reviews.text: It is beutiful and classic it is not light weight but it is very big it can cary up to 30 liters from what I tested I recomend
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Could use a few more pockets and padding but good overall backpack for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle Downs

customer_reviews.title: The quality and price of the product.
customer_reviews.text: The quality, price, and size of the product was great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: This bag already started coming apart at the seams after only a few uses. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: MB Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Happy Student
customer_reviews.text: My some was very happy how the durable and how the back pack looked. It made his day.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 15 yr old grandson-he loved it! Very nice looking and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love it
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot of room for my daughter for school you love it
customer_reviews.author: George pabey

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great choice for a student or athlete but please beware if you have a short torso like me this will look weird and is longer than your standard backpack. I would purchase again though if it fit me right.
customer_reviews.author: lisamariexo

product_meta.title: adidas Classic 3S II Backpack
product_meta.description: Clean lines and classic details come together on this functional bag. it features a roomy main compartment for books and larger items, a large patch pocket in front, and two side pockets with 3-stripes graphics. an internal computer sleeve protects electronics.
feature_bullets: Gently wash by hand. Do not bleach. Line dry
Large front patch pocket with plenty of room for your smaller stuff
